reviews.review_msg: Niall is funny and caring, make sure that you go to his office hours to review your papers before you hand them in. However, he tends to ramble. It takes him 20 minutes to say something that couldve been said in one sentence, which makes an already boring topic very very sleep-inducing. But, hes a fair marker and a kind guy, would take again.

What a great prof! Finally, a prof that actually cares about her students. She is very approachable and always willing to help make your essay better. She is a tough marker, but if you listen to her advice and follow it in your essay, you should be okay. Extremely personable and always happy :)
